name: Demon Star
description:
Play as two spacecraft in orbit around the Demon Star. The star's curse means only one ship can be controlled at a time, while the other is slowly pulled down to its doom. So powerful is the Demon Stars wrath that the uncontrolled ship is practically invulnerable, and may smash through any foe it  encounters.

With countless waves of asteroids and enemies bound your way, it's up to you to outlast the malevolent will of the star beneath you.

Features:

  • Chaotic top-down shooter game play
  • A combo-based scoring system
  • Ship-juggling antics
  • A heavy baseline

Controls:

  • The active ship moves automatically towards the mouse cursor
  • Left Click fires bullets in the current direction
  • Right Click switches active ships
  • The inactive ship deals massive damage on contact!
  • Score multiple times in between switches to increase your combo
